text.en: Magical embodiment of the wisdom of all the buddhas,
text.en-trans: gyalwa kün gyi yeshe gyumé ku

text.en: Thinking of you dispels the darkness from my heart.
text.en-trans: drenpé nying gi münpa sel dzepa

text.en: O noble Mañjughoṣa, I pray to you:
text.en-trans: jetsün jampé yang la solwa deb

text.en: Grant me prodigious intelligence, I pray!
text.en-trans: lodrö pünsum tsokpa tsal du sol
